title: Rotation Equivariant CNNs for Digital Pathology
venue: International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention

tldr.text: This work proposes a new model for digital pathology segmentation, based on the observation that histopathology images are inherently symmetric under rotation and reflection, and presents a novel derived dataset to enable principled comparison of machine learning models, in combination with an initial benchmark.
